The company announced a share offering Monday, as France-based Sanofi ( SNY ) exited its 23.2 million share stake. Regeneron agreed to purchase half the shares directly from Sanofi. United Airlines ( UAL ) and Expedia ( EXPE ) topped the Nasdaq 100. Seattle Genetics ( SGEN ) popped 2.7% as biotechs staged an early rally.
